name: Skipping Proper Research

bio: One of the most common pitfalls for property investors is failing to conduct adequate research. The South African property market is diverse, with each region, city, and neighborhood offering different opportunities and risks. Without in-depth research, investors may invest in areas with limited growth potential or higher risks.
